conbody.p: The term activity, as used in Design Studio and in the Triple'A Plus Web application, corresponds to a business activity that a user accomplishes in the running application. A connected user can access several activities in the application. The user can switch from one activity to another by selecting the first menu item. By changing the user profile, the list of available activities can be different.

Examples of business activities are:
Portfolio Analysis
Client Relationship Management
Audit

An activity is materialized by a package that is placed at the same level of the "aaa" package in the models project tree. For more information, refer to the Triple'A Plus Advanced Customisation Guide.
